text: A lovely monument to visit, very respectful environment for the tomb of the unknown soldier. The steps to the top could be challenging for some, but worth the effort for the views from the terrace. We booked tickets online beforehand so there was no wait. Strongly recommend this unless you like queues.

Repurchased tickets.  Easy security check and ticket scan. Approximately 200 steps to first level, 25 more to top. Steps are well kept with a very nice railing to make the climb easier, even for those with height issues. Beautiful views of all of Paris! Tomb of the unknown soldier is well kept and protected at the base

Great place to visit and see the whole of Paris.
You can access the top of the arc and have a 360 degrees view of the whole of Paris. Absolutely stunning.
The price for a ticket for an adult is €16.
You have to.climg the staircase to go all the way up so it is quite a lot of steps to climb but well worth it. If you get tired, you have enough space to stop, catch your breath and let other people pass by.
Once you reach the top, you have access to a mini museum with the history of the arc de triomphe, a souvenir store and toilets.
To see the view, climb one more floor up and enjoy the beauty of the city. You can spend as much time there as you want, take lots of photos and enjoy the view. Really well worth it.
To come down, you go down another staircase.
A few years ago, you would go up via a lift and use the staircase to go down.
I think the elevator is only available now for handicapped or elderly people.

I cannot begin to describe how beautiful this place is! Such an important piece of history, and what a great view of the city. The museum inside is pretty informative too, and makes sure that there isn’t too much boring information that just drags you along. The view of the city would have been better had there been blue skies, but no one can control that so it doesn’t impact it too much

I visited the place for fireworks on New Year’s Eve. Lots of people. If you don’t like crowd you can always move around as you can see the fireworks from all angles. That’s what I did. You will really like it. A way to start the new years. You can also visit the top to get a view of the whole city from the top.
